<< iscellstr data structures

isfield

Checks if a fieldname exists in a struct.

Syntax

res = isfield(S, name)
res = isfield(S, C)

Input argument

S

a struct

name

a string

C

a cell

Output argument

res

a logical

Description

isfield(A) returns true if name is a fieldname of S.

Examples

S.Nelson = 1;
isfield(S, 'Nel')
isfield(S, 'Nelson')


S.nel = 1;
S.son = 2;
isfield(S,{ 1, 'nel'; 2, 'son'})

See also

fieldnames.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET

<< iscellstr data structures
